title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.50 - Bond premium
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.50 - Bond premium

State Regulations

The net amount yielded by the sale of a bond or class of
bonds in excess of its face value. On the books and balance sheet of the issuer
it appears as a deferred credit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.50

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
